landing.trainertip.0: You can redeem your code cards in the Shop.
landing.trainertip.1: No employee of The Pokémon Company International will ever ask you for your password.
landing.trainertip.10: If you win 7 games with any of the Basic decks in the Trainer Challenge, you unlock that deck for PvP play, and you can use the cards in it to build other decks.
landing.trainertip.11: Trainer Tokens can be redeemed in the Shop for booster packs and theme decks.
landing.trainertip.12: The Standard format uses only the latest card sets.
landing.trainertip.13: When you create a new deck in the Deck Manager, you can choose to make it a Standard deck or an Unlimited deck.
landing.trainertip.14: You can build your own custom deck in the Deck Manager.
landing.trainertip.15: Code cards that you can redeem for digital products come from specially marked products where Pokémon cards are sold.
landing.trainertip.16: You can trade cards and unopened booster packs to other players in the Trading area.
landing.trainertip.17: The Unlimited format uses all cards available in the Pokémon TCG Online.
landing.trainertip.18: You can go to PokemonTCG.com to get information about the game.
landing.trainertip.19: The Unlimited format uses all cards available in the Pokémon TCG Online.
landing.trainertip.2: For the first PvP game you play each day, you will get a bonus 10 Trainer Tokens.
landing.trainertip.20: Before you accept a trade, always double-check to make sure you know what you are giving and getting.
landing.trainertip.21: You can earn additional prizes—Trainer Tokens and even booster packs—by replaying the Trainer Challenge.
landing.trainertip.22: If you take all 6 of your Prize cards, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.23: If you Knock Out your opponent's last Pokémon, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.24: If your opponent can't draw a card at the beginning of their turn, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.27: If a Pokémon is Asleep, it cannot attack or retreat.
landing.trainertip.28: Some attacks leave the Active Pokémon Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned—these are called "Special Conditions."
landing.trainertip.29: If a Pokémon is Burned, it may take damage between turns.
landing.trainertip.3: If a Confused Pokémon tries to attack, it may damage itself instead.
landing.trainertip.30: A Paralyzed Pokémon cannot attack or retreat.
landing.trainertip.31: A Poisoned Pokémon takes damage between turns.
landing.trainertip.32: Evolving a Pokémon or moving it to the Bench removes all Special Conditions.
landing.trainertip.33: Many Fire-type Pokémon are weak to Water-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.34: Many Grass-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.35: Many Water-type Pokémon are weak to Lightning-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.36: Many Lightning-type Pokémon are weak to Fighting-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.37: Many Psychic-type Pokémon are weak to other Psychic-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.38: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Psychic-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.39: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Water-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.4: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Grass-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.40: Many Darkness-type Pokémon are weak to Fighting-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.41: Many Metal-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.42: Many Metal-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.43: Looking for more cards? Visit the Shop!
landing.trainertip.44: Always be respectful toward fellow players.
landing.trainertip.45: Check out Pokemon.com or the forums at Pokemon.com/tcgo for deck-building strategies.
landing.trainertip.46: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).
landing.trainertip.47: Give us your thoughts on how we're doing and things you'd like to see in the game in the Forums at PokemonTCG.com.
landing.trainertip.48: User Experience can be toggled on and off in the Options Menu.
landing.trainertip.49: Found a bug? Log in at www.pokemon.com/support and click Ask a Question to report it!
landing.trainertip.5: You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).
landing.trainertip.50: Always be respectful toward fellow players.

newuserexperience.collectionscene.packop: Your journey into the Pokémon TCG Online is off to a great start! You can navigate anywhere from the Home screen.

newuserexperience.firstimeexperience.ach: There are all sorts of activities you can do in the game to earn more.
You can view all of these achievements in your profile.

I sure hope it's a good one.

newuserexperience.firstimeexperience.tok: Congratulations! You've just finished your first game. Here's a Trainer Token as a reward. You can redeem Trainer Tokens for cards, accessories, or avatar items in the Shop!
Once you get enough of those, you can redeem them for cool stuff like booster packs and theme decks in the Shop.
You might already have some from playing games on Pokemon.com.
With that win, you've unlocked a card for your deck! Win 7 games with a Basic deck to unlock all of the cards and earn it in your collection!
newuserexperience.firsttcwin.title: Congratulations!
newuserexperience.firsttimeexperience.fi: Congratulations! You just won a game against someone who was favored! You get 2 bonus Trainer Tokens for doing that.
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.ellagre: And I'm Ella! We're going to teach you how to play Pokémon!
If you Knock Out all of your opponent's Pokémon or take all of your Prize cards, you win!
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.label: Welcome
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.zachgre: In the Pokémon TCG, you'll battle your opponent's Pokémon with Pokémon of your own!
That's how you win. Let's get you into a game and show you more!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.deckbuilder: Here you can manage your decks for use in tournaments and PvP games.
There are 3 types of decks: Standard, Unlimited, and Theme Deck.
You can create Standard and Unlimited decks in the Deck Manager, as well as modify existing decks of both types!
We can also help you build your first deck. You choose your favorite Pokémon and we'll do the rest!
Now you can choose what you'd like to do. Have fun building your deck!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.firstvsgame: You might want to build a new deck for the next Versus game you play. Go to the Deck Manager and build a deck, or keep playing games to practice with the decks you have.
newuserexperience.fullscreen.goldleaguec: You've done it! You've won the Gold League! Congratulations!
You're definitely ready for bigger and better challenges. There are lots of great rewards waiting for you.
The Platinum League is now open! You can enter this league and challenge the other Trainers!
There is also Player vs. Player. Challenge your friends and other players to matches.
Or you can return to the Gold League to hone your Pokémon skills and try out new decks.
Now you can choose what you'd like to do. Enjoy your new challenges!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.pvpintro.di: One of the fun things about playing online is...
...you get to play against players from around the world.
You can always get back to this screen by selecting the lightning bolt button in the navigation bar.
Before you go, though, we have something to get you started.
A Trainer is only as good as their deck, so I want to make sure you have a very good deck to start with.
This is a "mighty" deck that you can use in PvP!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.quickplayre: Welcome back! Ready for another game?
newuserexperience.fullscreen.trainingint: Let me introduce you to some of the other Trainers. Play against them to earn rewards!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.label: Guest Login
newuserexperience.guestlogin.speechbubbl: Welcome to our game store! Let's play a game of Pokémon!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.tcwin01: This is the Trainer Challenge. Here you can play the first league in the Pokémon TCG Online: the Gold League!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.tcwin02: If you create a Pokémon Trainer Club account, you'll be able to collect cards, build decks, and compete against other Trainers!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.ella.speec: Thanks for playing with us today!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.speechbubb: Thanks for playing with us today! If you make an account, you'll be able to collect cards and build your own decks!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.zach.speec: If you make an account, you'll be able to collect cards and build your own decks!
newuserexperience.leavinggame.label: Leaving the Game?
newuserexperience.leavinggame.title: Leaving the Game
newuserexperience.productopening: Opening booster packs is exciting! You can earn more booster packs by playing games.
newuserexperience.quickgameintro.title: Quick Game
newuserexperience.quickplay.label: Introduction
newuserexperience.quickplayreentry.ellaq: Welcome back! Ready for another game?
newuserexperience.reentry.fs.title: Welcome Back to Quick Play
newuserexperience.reentry.tc.title: Welcome Back
newuserexperience.speechbubble1.text: Thank you for playing with us today!
newuserexperience.speechbubble10.text: Do you still want to leave?
newuserexperience.speechbubble2.text: I hope you had as much fun as we did!
newuserexperience.speechbubble3.text: Come back tomorrow, and you'll earn 25 Trainer Tokens!
newuserexperience.speechbubble4.text: Come back tomorrow, and you'll earn 5 booster packs!
newuserexperience.speechbubble5.text: These Trainer Tokens can be used to get more cards in the Shop for play online.
newuserexperience.speechbubble6.text: Every day you come back, there will be a new reward for you!
newuserexperience.speechbubble9.text: Let's get you right into a game!
newuserexperience.trainerchallengereentr: The Trainers have been excited to play you!
newuserexperience.trainingreferral.body: Check out the new Training mode! Learn to play and earn rewards!
newuserexperience.trainingscene.cardunlo: We've added this card to your deck. Now it's even better!
newuserexperience.trainingscene.reentry: Welcome back! Your next opponent is ready for you. Hit the Play! button to start.
Do you want to play again?
Or do you want to have another lesson with me?
By the way, if you think you're ready for the full game, you can unlock it in the Options menu.
newuserexperience.uniques.firstgamewin.s: I think you're ready to play some other Trainers.
There are 11 more games in the Gold League.
After you defeat each Trainer, the game will unlock the next.
Winning 8 games with the same deck against different opponents will unlock the deck and cards for PvP!
newuserexperience.uniques.seconddaylogin: Check your messages in the Social Tab in the upper-left menu.
I bet it's that 25 Trainer Token reward that Ella told you about.
Here are three more achievements to try for!
Get all three of these, and I'll give you a special prize.

product.avatarcharizardpack.description: Introducing the sizzling Charizard-Themed Avatar Collection Box! Each box contains 3 avatar items from this impressive 35-item collection. Completed collections feature a total of 6 outfits plus an assortment of avatar accessories designed in the theme of the fearsome Charizard. Items vary by box. Items are tradable.

product.avatarpikachupack.description: Introducing the electrifying Pikachu-Themed Avatar Collection! Each box contains 3 avatar items from this awesome 35-item collection. Completed collections feature a total of 6 outfits plus an assortment of avatar accessories designed in the theme of Pikachu. Items vary by box. Items are tradable.
product.avatarpikachupack.name: Pikachu-Themed Avatar Collection Box
product.bw1.booster.description: Exciting New Discoveries, Powerful New Pokémon… More Epic Battles! \nA new generation of Pokémon has arrived! The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White expansion brings you a legion of over 70 new Pokémon from the newly explored Unova region, including the Legendary Reshiram and Zekrom, both featuring never-before-seen art that covers the ENTIRE card! The Pokémon TCG: Black & White expansion is your gateway to a bigger Pokémon world!

product.bw1.pcd.redfrenzy.name: Red Frenzy
product.bw10.booster.description: Challenges ring out, Pokémon duel, and the battle for Unova enters the next chapter in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Blast expansion! With Virizion-EX by your side, you must lead the counterattack against the failing forces of Team Plasma as they mount their last stand behind the twinned might of Team Plasma Dialga-EX and Palkia-EX! Victory is within your grasp, when suddenly you face your greatest test…the mighty and mysterious Genesect-EX takes the battlefield, supported by devastating ACE SPEC cards that give it additional attacks! Trainers, it's time to break the ice!
product.bw10.pcd.mindwipe.name: Mind Wipe
product.bw10.pcd.solarstrike.name: Solar Strike
product.bw11.booster.description: Legends lost are recovered, buried treasures are found, and in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Legendary Treasures expansion, Pokémon as you've never seen them will dazzle you! Discover new Pokémon-EX, as well as the return of mighty champions. Find new Trainer cards to revolutionize your battle strategy! Command your forces and drive onward to victory! Locate the scattered jewels of the Radiant Collection! And, above all, hunt for the golden glimmers that signify an amazing find…
product.bw2.booster.description: Forces Unveiled, Strengths Revealed… Powers Emerged! \nThe secrets of the Unova region are now yours to command! In the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion, astonishing new Pokémon are available for the very first time, including the rare and powerful Legendary Pokémon Cobalion, Terrakion, Virizion, Thundurus, and Tornadus! With brand-new Item cards to revitalize your deck, the Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion offers Trainers all of the amazing new strategies of Unova!
product.bw2.pcd.powerplay.name: Power Play
product.bw2.pcd.toxictricks.name: Toxic Tricks
product.bw3.booster.description: New Legends for a Noble Victory! \nThe Black & White—Noble Victories expansion crowns you a noble among players! Choose from more than 90 amazing new Pokémon, including the Victory Pokémon Victini, plus new Fossil and Legendary Pokémon. Noble Victories helps you battle in style with new powers, new strategies, and new ways to conquer your opponents. So, seize the spoils—rally your Pokémon and get ready to battle your way to victory!
product.bw3.pcd.fastdaze.name: Fast Daze
product.bw3.pcd.furiousknights.name: Furious Knights
product.bw4.booster.description: Expect a Battle-Filled Destiny with Pokémon-EX! \nThe Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Next Destinies expansion is loaded with powerful Pokémon-EX to give you extraordinary excitement! Discover great Pokémon like Reshiram-EX and Zekrom-EX, and even Pokémon from beyond the Unova region, like Mewtwo-EX. Next Destinies delivers your destiny: Pokémon with exceptional HP, Special Energy and Trainer cards with expanded powers, and expert strategies to extend your victory streaks!
product.bw4.pcd.explosiveedge.name: Explosive Edge
product.bw4.pcd.voltagevortex.name: Voltage Vortex
product.bw5.booster.description: Brace Yourself to Explore the Darkness… \nWhat's out there in the darkness, waiting to be discovered? Play the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Dark Explorers expansion and find them all! In addition to more Pokémon-EX like Tornadus-EX, Raikou-EX, and Groudon-EX, the shadows are filled with other exceptional surprises, like Darkrai-EX and a host of Trainer cards that will knock your opponent's lights out! When you play Black & White—Dark Explorers, you'll not only explore the darkness, you'll rule it!
product.bw5.pcd.raiders.name: Raiders
product.bw5.pcd.shadows.name: Shadows
product.bw6.booster.description: The might of dragons is yours to control in a way that can change your game forever—as a brand-new Energy type! Rayquaza. Giratina. Hydreigon. Few Pokémon inspire awe and wonder like Dragon-type Pokémon, and in the Dragons Exalted expansion, they come ready to rule the game! And with a grand mix of all-new Pokémon-EX and a horde of Dragon-type Pokémon to take to the skies and take the battlefield by storm, plus new Trainer cards and new Special Energy cards, you'll be ready for the roar of dragons and the glory of battle!
product.bw6.pcd.dragonsnarl.name: DragonSnarl
product.bw6.pcd.dragonspeed.name: DragonSpeed
product.bw7.booster.description: Step into the next dimension of your journey into battle using the might of the Boundary Pokémon…both White Kyurem and Black Kyurem! Harness the powers of more Pokémon-EX like Landorus, Cresselia, and Celebi, and Keldeo makes its debut in the Black & White—Boundaries Crossed expansion as both a Pokémon and a Pokémon-EX, along with the never-before-seen, powerful ACE SPEC Trainer cards, which are so devastating that you can only carry one into battle! Cross over to sweep aside your opponents with one mighty push!
product.bw8.booster.description: Clouds gather, Energy crackles, and when you play the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Storm expansion, a new force will be felt as the tempestuous Team Plasma makes its debut! All must make ready for a new battlefield, featuring electrifying Team Plasma Pokémon, game-changing Trainer cards, and Team Plasma Pokémon-EX such as Articuno-EX, Zapdos-EX, and Lugia-EX. And, as all-new, powerful ACE SPEC cards blast the balance of power and even more amazing Pokémon-EX race into battle, a question must be asked: Trainers, are you ready? Prepare for the Plasma Storm!
product.bw8.pcd.plasmaclaw.name: Plasma Claw
product.bw8.pcd.plasmashadow.name: Plasma Shadow
product.bw9.booster.description: Team Plasma's frosty assault on Unova continues in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Freeze expansion, and Trainers everywhere must show an icy resolve if they are to halt the relentless deep freeze! The struggle will be bitter as Team Plasma releases a blizzard of Team Plasma Pokémon, including Deoxys-EX, Thundurus-EX, and all of Eevee's Evolutions, backed by Team Plasma Energy, Item, and Supporter cards. But, with the Legendary Eon Pokémon Latios and Latias standing by your side and a host of Pokémon-EX ready to do battle, your opponents will find that now is the winter of their discontent!

product.col.pcd.recon.name: Recon
product.col.pcd.retort.name: Retort
product.dv.booster.description: The vault echoes with the roar of Dragons—can you train what you find within? Inside the Pokémon TCG: Dragon Vault, you'll discover a treasure trove you've never seen before! You'll find incredible Dragon Pokémon such as Rayquaza and Druddigon—ALL of them foil!—in special 5-card booster packs, plus a code card to unlock hoards of rewards for the Pokémon TCG Online. So, when you open the vault, be prepared to command the might of these powerful Dragon Pokémon!
product.gameplay.deckbox.lightblue_darkb: Light Blue & Dark Blue Deck Box
product.hgss1.booster.description: Journey to the Johto Region to Reveal HeartGold & SoulSilver! \nPokémon are the heart and soul of any great Pokémon Trainer, and now is your chance to catch some of the greatest Pokémon of all time! With new kinds of cards that will change the way you play—like Pokémon Prime and the astonishing Pokémon LEGENDs Ho-Oh and Lugia—plus lots of Trainer cards that will accelerate your game and select Energy cards with a brand-new look, the HeartGold & SoulSilver expansion will get you started on your journey to greatness!
product.hgss1.pcd.emberspark.name: Ember Spark
product.hgss1.pcd.growthclash.name: Growth Clash
product.hgss1.pcd.mindflood.name: Mind Flood
product.hgss2.booster.description: Pokémon LEGENDs Freed...Pokémon Prime Released...HS—Unleashed! \nRaikou... Entei... Suicune... Alone, each of these Legendary Pokémon is a force to be reckoned with, but let loose in pairs, they become amazing LEGEND cards! In the HS—Unleashed expansion, you'll find Pokémon Prime bursting at the seams, powerful Pokémon like Jirachi and Shaymin raring to join the battle, and Pokémon LEGENDs joining forces for twice the excitement! Are you a powerful enough Trainer to command what's been Unleashed?
product.hgss2.pcd.chaoscontrol.descripti: The chaotic powers that have been unleashed can only be controlled by an amazing Pokémon Trainer. Is it you? In the Chaos Control theme deck, you'll need to balance devastating attacks like Tyranitar's Tail Crush and Lucario's Bulk Up against more strategic approaches like Mismagius's Psychic Pulse. With all of your opponent's Pokémon vulnerable to your battle plans, can you control your forces until victory is yours?
product.hgss2.pcd.chaoscontrol.name: Chaos Control
product.hgss2.pcd.steelsentinel.name: Steel Sentinel
product.hgss3.booster.description: No Challenge Too Great, No Battle Too Fierce: HS—Undaunted!\nThe greatest Trainers are those who are fearless in the face of battle. And that's you! In the Pokémon TCG: HS—Undaunted expansion, you'll discover battle-ready Pokémon just waiting to be summoned by the fearless Trainer in you! The powerful Rayquaza and Deoxys become a Pokémon LEGEND to be reckoned with...six Pokémon—from Raichu to Umbreon to Slowking—join the ranks of Pokémon Prime...and Stadium cards like the Ruins of Alph and Trainer cards like Legend Box change every player's strategy. Are you ready to be Undaunted?
product.hgss3.pcd.daybreak.name: Daybreak
product.hgss3.pcd.nightfall.name: Nightfall
product.hgss4.booster.description: The Goal of Every Battle, the Pride of Every Trainer… \nBattle for the excitement, for the challenge…and for the victory! In the Pokémon Trading Card Game: HS—Triumphant expansion, you'll find what you need to put triumph within your reach. Palkia and Dialga combine as an incredible Pokémon LEGEND. Machamp, Gengar, and a half-dozen other powerful Pokémon appear for the first time as Pokémon Prime. New Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards—plus a new Special Energy card—give you new strategies and deck ideas. The only thing missing is a Trainer who battles to win…and that's you!
product.hgss4.pcd.royalguard.name: Royal Guard
product.hgss4.pcd.verdantfrost.name: Verdant Frost
product.hgss5.booster.description: Joining of Powers, Battle of Forces, Call of Legends \nTheir names are legend: Raikou. Entei. Suicune. Lugia. Ho-Oh. Kyogre. Groudon. Rayquaza. Deoxys. Dialga. Palkia. And when Legendary Pokémon come together, only the greatest Trainers can control their might. In the Pokémon TCG: Call of Legends expansion, not only will you discover incredibly powerful Pokémon—including very rare "Shiny" versions of some of them—but you'll also find exciting new Lost Zone effects to expand your gameplay choices. The Legendary Pokémon have gathered—are you ready to answer the call?

product.tatm.booster.description: Two teams of villains emerge from their hideouts to clash over the fate of the world in Pokémon TCG: Double Crisis! Inside special 7-card booster packs, you'll discover incredible Team Aqua and Team Magma Pokémon. Get ready for danger, get ready for trouble—get ready for Double Crisis!
product.tk5.nighthunter.name: Night Hunter
product.tk6a.xytrainerkit.name: Mindbind
product.tk7a.xytrainerkit.name: Claw Barrage
product.tk7b.xytrainerkit.name: Claw Barrage
product.tk8a.xytrainerkit.name: Eon Strike
product.treasureboxpack.description: Uncommon Chests contain a random number of Trainer Tokens and 1 random card of uncommon (or higher) rarity from a recent Pokémon TCG expansion. Contents are automatically updated as new expansions are released.
product.treasureboxpack.name: Uncommon Chest
product.xy0.pcd.card12.name: Froakie Deck
product.xy0.pcd.card3.name: Chespin Deck
product.xy0.pcd.card8.name: Fennekin Deck
product.xy1.booster.description: Kalos has been revealed, yet so much still remains unseen! New Trainers, new tactics, and the awe-inspiring Xerneas and Yveltal await—as does something else. Something…different. Something to make even the mightiest of Pokémon-EX tremble! A new age begins in the Pokémon TCG with Mega Evolution!
product.xy1.pcd.destructionrush.name: Destruction Rush
product.xy1.pcd.resilientlife.name: Resilient Life
product.xy1.resilientlife.name: Resilient Life
product.xy2.booster.description: Blaze your way to glory and watch the sparks fly when you play Pokémon TCG: XY—Flashfire! Ignite the action with a firestorm of Fire types and watch your opponents' terrified double-take as the awesome Mega Charizard-EX makes its scorching debut in this breathtaking expansion! Your explosive adventures will continue as your foes flee the field with certain doom flashing before their eyes!
product.xy2.pcd.brilliantthunder.name: Brilliant Thunder
product.xy2.pcd.mystictyphoon.name: Mystic Typhoon
product.xy3.booster.description: Become King of the Ring!\nTrainers, step in the ring and fire up your ferocity for the Pokémon TCG: XY—Furious Fists expansion! Brace yourselves for a grand tournament unlike any before with Mega Lucario-EX and Mega Heracross-EX! And, as the competition intensifies, a host of Pokémon appear for the first time in the Pokémon TCG—each one eager to prove itself as a master of battle! With a team backed by brand-new Trainer cards to power up your Fighting-type Pokémon, your opponents will be left wondering what hit them!
product.xy3.pcd.darkhammer.name: Dark Hammer
product.xy3.pcd.enchantedecho.name: Enchanted Echo
product.xy4.booster.description: Master Mysterious Powers!\nGather your courage and peer into the haunted void with the Pokémon TCG: XY—Phantom Forces expansion! Mega Manectric-EX makes a shocking appearance to light the way, while the ghostly grin of Mega Gengar-EX frightens challengers near and far. Take along Aegislash-EX to give you an edge, push the limits of Mega Evolution with new Spirit Link cards, and call on all of your Trainer knowledge to escape the eerie forces at work!
product.xy4.pcd.bolttwister.name: Bolt Twister
product.xy4.pcd.burningwinds.name: Burning Winds
product.xy5.booster.description: Ancient Rivals Awaken!\nAfter centuries asleep, the deep power of Primal Groudon-EX erupts from the land as Primal Kyogre-EX crashes in from the sea, riding titanic waves into battle! With colossal new arrivals like Mega Gardevoir-EX and Mega Aggron-EX, the Pokémon TCG: XY—Primal Clash expansion is alive with the primordial power of Ancient Traits—plus all-new Spirit Link and Special Energy cards! Let the earth shake and the oceans thunder, and get ready for a primal clash like no other!
product.xy5.pcd.earthspulse.name: Earth's Pulse
product.xy5.pcd.oceanscore.name: Ocean's Core
product.xy6.booster.description: Ride the Winds of Battle!\nDiving from the edge of space, Mega Rayquaza-EX makes its magnificent debut while Mega Latios-EX and a horde of Dragon types bellow their challenge! With high-flying superstars like Deoxys, Dragonite, Zekrom, Hydreigon-EX, and Thundurus-EX, the Pokémon TCG: XY—Roaring Skies expansion calls you to battle higher, faster, stronger—and with all-new boosts like Mega Turbo and Double Dragon Energy cards, the sky's the limit! Ascend to the clouds and soar to victory!
product.xy8.booster.description: Parallel Worlds: Two Paths to Power!\nAn amazing discovery! Pokémon BREAK Evolution opens a new path to power that builds on a Pokémon's existing strengths and creates all-new battling options! These new Pokémon BREAK come from twin worlds, home to Zoroark BREAK, Mega Mewtwo X, and Mega Mewtwo Y. One world of technology, one world of nature, and all the wonders of BREAK Evolution are yours to explore in the Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough expansion!

specialvisualizations.moveenergywhenally: When an Active Pokémon is Knocked Out, its owner moves 1 basic Energy card from that Pokémon to this Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.mustfliptoattack: This Pokémon's owner must flip a coin successfully before it can use an attack.
specialvisualizations.mustfliptoplaytrai: A coin must be flipped to play Trainer cards. If tails, the Trainer card has no effect.
specialvisualizations.pokemontoolhasnoef: This Pokémon Tool has no effect.
specialvisualizations.poketoolattached: This Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached.
specialvisualizations.prizecardvalueredu: The player who Knocks Out this Pokémon takes one fewer Prize card.
specialvisualizations.reflipforattacks: This Pokémon's owner may choose to reflip coins from this Pokémon's attacks.
specialvisualizations.resistanceincrease: This Pokémon's Resistance has been increased.
specialvisualizations.retreatcostincreas: This Pokémon's Retreat Cost has been increased.
specialvisualizations.retreatcostreduced: This Pokémon's Retreat Cost has been reduced.
specialvisualizations.specialburnamount: This Pokémon takes more damage from being Burned.
specialvisualizations.specialparalyzedur: This Pokémon has been Paralyzed for a longer duration.
specialvisualizations.specialpoisonamoun: This Pokémon takes more damage from being Poisoned.
specialvisualizations.turncontinuesonmeg: The turn will not end when this Pokémon evolves.
specialvisualizations.weaknessadded: This Pokémon has an additional Weakness.
specialvisualizations.weaknesschanged: This Pokémon's Weakness has been changed.
specialvisualizations.weaknessremoved: This Pokémon's Weakness has been removed.
standardqueueselect.tooltip.label: Only Standard decks are eligible for this format.
systemnotification.title: System Notification
tc.deckunlocked.basicdeck.body: Congratulations! You've unlocked a new deck in your Collection!
tc.league.championship.game1.loadscreen2: Oh, those guys? They're my brother's friends.
tc.league.championship.game1.loadscreen3: I said you guys were good, and they wanted to see for themselves…
tc.league.championship.game1.playerloss1: Oh YEAH! Victory against all odds!
tc.league.championship.game1.playerloss2: Against all comers! That means YOU, champ!
tc.league.championship.game1.playerwin2: With Daniel and Rika around, I'm a second-stringer.
tc.league.championship.game1.playerwin3: I'll tell you a secret, though: YOU are too...
tc.league.championship.game1.pregame3: or else you're gonna get checked to the boards!
tc.league.championship.game10.loadscreen: That was quite an outpouring of local pride.
But pride doesn't win games. Nor do hurt feelings.
tc.league.championship.game10.playerloss: Mmm. I think I know where you went wrong there.
If you want, I can walk you through it.
Why don't we play again while we're at it?
tc.league.championship.game10.playerwin1: One victory is luck. A run of victories is skill.
tc.league.championship.game10.playerwin3: Good luck. I hope you go the distance…
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame1: I misjudged you the last time we played.
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame2: You clearly have the skill to win this tournament.
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame3: But do you have the fire? The drive? The WILL to prevail?
tc.league.championship.game11.loadscreen: Sweet! We both made it past the quarterfinals.
No hard feelings, whatever happens, OK?
Promise me you'll take home the trophy if you win!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerloss: Sorry. Didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
It's just good to win, you know? I'll take down Daniel for ya!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin1: Shock! Horror! The three-time champ wins again!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin2: Seriously, though, I'm pulling for you. All of us are.
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin3: Don't let Daniel steal our city championship!
tc.league.championship.game11.pregame1: You beat Rika, right? I saw her giving tips to Calvin and Juji.
tc.league.championship.game11.pregame2: She seems OK. Daniel, though… Well, he takes winning for granted.
tc.league.championship.game12.loadscreen: I had a feeling it would come to this.
I'm glad to have a worthy opponent.
tc.league.championship.game12.playerloss: Still, a win is a win, right?
Now, if you'll hand me my trophy…
tc.league.championship.game12.playerwin1: And the home team is victorious! Congratulations.
tc.league.championship.game12.playerwin3: I hope to see you at the State Championship...
tc.league.championship.game12.pregame1: This is it, then. One game for all the marbles.
tc.league.championship.game2.loadscreen1: These guys played at the World Championships?
tc.league.championship.game2.loadscreen2: Why do they want to pick on US?
tc.league.championship.game2.playerloss3: Come on, let's play another game!
tc.league.championship.game2.playerwin2: At least I made you work for it this time!
tc.league.championship.game2.playerwin3: Let me know if you have any tips?
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame1: I wanted to show everyone how much I'd improved…
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame2: but that Rika girl acted like I didn't know the rules!
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame3: Well, I can show YOU, anyway.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. That big guy, Otis, is one cool customer.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen2: Hardly said a word while we were playing.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen3: He must have ice water in his veins…
tc.league.championship.game3.playerloss2: You've got to keep your cool. Keep it together.
tc.league.championship.game3.playerloss3: Want to give it another try? I know you can do this.
tc.league.championship.game3.playerwin2: You didn't sweat that for a moment, did you?
tc.league.championship.game3.playerwin3: Keep that up, and you'll take home the trophy!
tc.league.championship.game3.pregame2: She lost to the new girl—Rika?—last round.
tc.league.championship.game3.pregame3: Well, no use in whining. Let's battle!
tc.league.championship.game4.loadscreen3: Your manners are better than those of SOME people around here…
tc.league.championship.game4.playerloss2: I expected better of a three-time champion.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerloss3: Play again? Strictly for fun, of course.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin1: Capable, polite, AND gracious in victory?
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin2: Good. I was worried this was a waste of time.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin3: May we meet again…in the finals.
tc.league.championship.game4.pregame2: That's all you need to win at Pokémon.
tc.league.championship.game4.pregame3: Let's see how your skills stack up.
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen1: Hey. It's kinda tense in here, huh?
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen2: I like the game, but I wouldn't fly to other cities to play!
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen3: I guess that's what dedication looks like.
tc.league.championship.game5.playerloss2: If I make the finals, I'll have to ditch my play rehearsal.
tc.league.championship.game5.playerloss3: Let's try that again! Don't let me down this time!
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin1: Heh, it looks like YOU found a balance…
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin2: between decisive victory and total humiliation!
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin3: Good job! I guess I'll make it to rehearsal after all.
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame1: Don't get me wrong. I care about the game!
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame2: I just won't let it take over my life.
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame3: You've gotta find a balance, right?
tc.league.championship.game6.playerloss3: Want a rematch? Show me what you're made of...
tc.league.championship.game6.playerwin1: Good game. Rika was right about you.
tc.league.championship.game6.pregame1: You really want to win, huh?
tc.league.championship.game7.loadscreen2: I need to win every game from here on out to make Top 8…
tc.league.championship.game7.loadscreen3: and that means you're going DOWN.
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss1: The natural order is restored, and *I* am victorious!
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss2: What's that? You want a rematch?
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss3: Oh, sure, why not. It's not like you'll win.
tc.league.championship.game7.playerwin1: Look at you. Crushing others' dreams for the sake of YOUR ambition.
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame1: Did you play that Rika chick?
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame2: She offered to give me tips. Me!
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame3: Can you BELIEVE that? Of all the nerve!
tc.league.championship.game8.loadscreen1: Ah, {0}. I've heard a lot about you.
tc.league.championship.game8.loadscreen2: Time to test your skills for myself…
tc.league.championship.game8.playerloss2: Still, you gave me a run for my money.
tc.league.championship.game8.playerloss3: Again? I wouldn't mind seeing more of your deck…
tc.league.championship.game8.playerwin1: Well, played, {0}. My first loss of the day.
tc.league.championship.game8.playerwin2: I expect to meet you in the finals.
tc.league.championship.game8.pregame2: It's true. I haven't dropped a game.
tc.league.championship.game8.pregame3: Let's see if YOU can break my winning streak…
tc.league.championship.game9.loadscreen2: You just played Daniel? I feel for ya.
tc.league.championship.game9.loadscreen3: He's friendly once the game's over, but while you're playing…brr.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss1: Sorry, buddy. That was kind of a beating, huh?
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss2: I guess I don't know my own strength.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss3: You want a shame-breaker? Let's try that again.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerwin1: Good match, {0}. I thought I had you there!
tc.league.championship.game9.playerwin2: Let's check the rankings. See who made it to the quarterfinals.
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame1: Our cohort's really been taking body blows today.
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame2: You knocked out Cammie. Calvin's on the brink…
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame3: If one of us doesn't win, we'll have a pro for our champion!
tc.league.diamond.complete: You are the Diamond League Champion!
tc.league.gold.complete: You are the Gold League Champion!
tc.league.gold.game1.loadscreen2: This is what I live for!
tc.league.gold.game1.playerloss2: But it looks like you met your match!
tc.league.gold.game1.playerwin2: Looks like you'll fit right in.
tc.league.gold.game1.playerwin3: Say hi to Mick for me when you play!
tc.league.gold.game10.loadscreen2: I've enjoyed seeing your progress in this League!
tc.league.gold.game10.playerloss1: Your face is looking mighty pale.
tc.league.gold.game10.playerloss3: Tee-hee! Well played, {0}. Let's rematch, OK?
tc.league.gold.game10.playerwin2: You knocked the stuffing out of my deck!
tc.league.gold.game10.playerwin3: Go for the Gold. I believe in you!
tc.league.gold.game10.pregame2: But it sure is nice! Especially in a tournament!
tc.league.gold.game11.loadscreen2: Are you bidding to become my...rival?
tc.league.gold.game11.playerloss1: The wheels of justice grind slow but fine...
tc.league.gold.game11.playerloss3: Try again? I want to know my win wasn't luck!
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin1: So much for my strong-as-steel Metal deck...
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin2: You crumpled it! Like aluminum foil!
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin3: Still, I gotta admit you played great. I’ll cheer for you in the finals!
tc.league.gold.game11.pregame1: They say I have a heart of gold...
tc.league.gold.game11.pregame2: until they face me in an important match.
tc.league.gold.game12.loadscreen1: I thought winning this Championship would be easy.
tc.league.gold.game12.loadscreen3: Now it's a piece of cake!
tc.league.gold.game12.playerloss1: Yes!! All light has turned to DARKNESS!
tc.league.gold.game12.playerloss3: Why are you still here? To re-enact my triumph?
tc.league.gold.game12.playerwin2: Clearly I took you too lightly!
tc.league.gold.game12.pregame1: I promise to still be friends, win or lose...
tc.league.gold.game12.pregame2: Especially if I win and you lose!
tc.league.gold.game2.pregame2: Am I scared? Not a bit.
tc.league.gold.game2.pregame3: Just "good" isn't enough to beat me!
tc.league.gold.game3.playerloss2: You just got DUNKED by my Water deck!
tc.league.gold.game3.playerloss3: Would you like to play again?
tc.league.gold.game3.playerwin3: If I can't beat you, my sister Penelope will!
tc.league.gold.game3.pregame2: This is the first League I've played in.
tc.league.gold.game3.pregame3: Take it easy on me, OK?
tc.league.gold.game4.loadscreen1: I had a feeling we'd be meeting soon.
tc.league.gold.game4.playerloss1: I really don't like to brag...
tc.league.gold.game4.playerwin2: I guess my victory just wasn't in the cards.
tc.league.gold.game4.pregame2: I'm afraid to say...it doesn't look too bright.
tc.league.gold.game4.pregame3: Still, the spirits and I bid you GOOD LUCK!
tc.league.gold.game5.playerloss3: Did I steal your thunder? Let's have a rematch!
tc.league.gold.game5.playerwin1: What?! You beat my Lightning deck?
tc.league.gold.game5.pregame2: Excuse me, was I singing out loud?
tc.league.gold.game5.pregame3: Good luck! This should be over in a FLASH!
tc.league.gold.game6.loadscreen1: Hey, I'm Juji. Welcome to the League!
tc.league.gold.game6.loadscreen2: You played Ali, right? Isn't she cool?
tc.league.gold.game6.playerloss2: I guess it's true: act confident and the rest follows!
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin1: Yowza! Um. Jeepers! Oh, that's no good either!
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin2: I wonder what Ali and Brittney would say when they lose?
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin3: *ahem* Good win! Hope to play you again soon.
tc.league.gold.game6.pregame1: Mick told me I should work on my trash talk.
tc.league.gold.game6.pregame2: So, uh...you don't have a FIGHTING chance of winning!
tc.league.gold.game7.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. You've done well so far.
tc.league.gold.game7.loadscreen2: Let's see which of our decks has the EDGE.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerloss1: Good game. That was closer than I expected.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerloss2: But my high degree of SKILL has prevailed.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerwin2: You defeated a statistically superior opponent!
tc.league.gold.game7.playerwin3: I guess there’s a first for everything! Hope to meet you in the finals!
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame1: I play a lot of Pokémon games on my DS...
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame2: But human opponents are way more fun.
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame3: Good luck! Don't make this too easy!
tc.league.gold.game8.loadscreen2: No boxing or food jokes, please.
tc.league.gold.game8.loadscreen3: I get enough of those from Mick.
tc.league.gold.game8.playerloss2: Winning gets me all worked up.
tc.league.gold.game8.playerwin2: I can see you're going to be a real contender.
tc.league.gold.game9.loadscreen1: So, I hear you defeated my brother. I stick up for my family!
tc.league.gold.game9.playerloss1: Ha, ha, ha! Gaze into my crystal ball!
tc.league.gold.game9.playerwin1: Wow. My Psychic and Water deck just EVAPORATED.
tc.league.gold.game9.playerwin2: Ffft! So much for avenging Calvin!!
tc.league.platinum.complete: You are the Platinum League Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game1.loadscreen1: Oh yeah! League Champion in the house!
tc.league.platinum.game1.playerwin1: Wow, you've come a long way.
tc.league.platinum.game1.playerwin2: My Water deck is...all washed up!
tc.league.platinum.game1.pregame2: Let's see how you hold up under pressure...
tc.league.platinum.game10.loadscreen1: I hope you realize who you're facing off against.
tc.league.platinum.game10.loadscreen2: I won't take it easy on you just because this is your second League!
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss1: They say I used to be a spoiled brat.
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss2: You don't believe that, do you?
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss3: I'm really very nice when I get what I want.
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerwin3: That's no way to treat anybody! Behave yourself!
tc.league.platinum.game10.pregame1: To show you how thoughtful I am, I brought you some tissues.
tc.league.platinum.game10.pregame3: That way, you won't cry all over your deck! Haha!
tc.league.platinum.game11.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. I figured I would face you again.
tc.league.platinum.game11.loadscreen2: I got all pumped by listening to my favorite bands.
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerloss3: Good game. Better luck next time!
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerwin2: My driving beat...turned into a total beatdown!
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerwin3: Still, you played well. Good luck!
tc.league.platinum.game11.pregame1: I won't let this end like last time.
tc.league.platinum.game11.pregame2: I can still hear samples and synths in my head.
tc.league.platinum.game12.loadscreen2: But this time...victory will be mine!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerloss1: You gave it your all! But you're down for the count.
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin1: Holy cow! You knocked my block off!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin2: If we were fighting for real, I'd have a concussion!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin3: Let's face it, {0}—you win! Good game!
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame1: I've been waiting for this moment.
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame2: All of my training is about to pay off.
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame3: Come on, {0}! Give me your best shot!
tc.league.platinum.game2.loadscreen2: Don't hold back! I can take it!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss1: Lost, huh? I've been studying up!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss2: I guess my botanical approach to the game paid off.
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss3: Still, you're looking rather green. Care to play me again?
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin1: Huh, that sure showed me! I thought I was a seasoned player...
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin2: But I guess I'm still as green as Grass!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin3: Well played! Good luck with the rest of the League!
tc.league.platinum.game2.pregame1: Wait, you're not new? League Champion, huh?
tc.league.platinum.game2.pregame2: Man, and here I thought this would be an easy match...
tc.league.platinum.game3.loadscreen2: Congratulations on winning the Gold League!
tc.league.platinum.game3.loadscreen3: Maybe this time I'll meet you in the finals!
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerloss2: And I totally TOASTED you today.
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerloss3: You can do better than that. Give it another try?
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerwin1: Nicely played! I thought I was going to serve you up...
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerwin2: but I was the one whose goose got cooked!
tc.league.platinum.game3.pregame1: Ella's been giving me some tips...
tc.league.platinum.game3.pregame2: so this won't be as easy as last time!
tc.league.platinum.game4.loadscreen1: So, {0}! Got your eyes on the prize?
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerloss3: Let me know when you're ready for another title shot!
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin1: Whoa, where did that come from?
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin2: You hit me with a HAYMAKER!
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin3: Well done! You deserve to be Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game4.pregame1: They say the best defense is a good offense...
tc.league.platinum.game4.pregame2: and who am I to argue?
tc.league.platinum.game5.loadscreen2: Sorry I was so shy...you know. Before.
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss1: Don't feel bad. Everyone's nerves get to them sometimes.
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss2: Mine get to me a LOT!
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss3: Want to give it another go?
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerwin2: But you kept it together and played well!
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerwin3: Good game! You might even become Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game5.pregame1: You've done well to get this far, {0}.
tc.league.platinum.game6.loadscreen1: Heya! Ya know, I'm the odds-on favorite in this matchup!
tc.league.platinum.game6.loadscreen2: I hate to brag, but numbers don't lie!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss1: Woo! My victory is no surprise...but it's still a thrill!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss2: I love winning ALMOST as much as math.
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss3: Let's play again. Maybe you can buck the odds!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerwin1: Wow, nice. Looks like you bent the odds in your favor!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerwin2: If you keep playing this well, I'll see you in the finals!
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerloss2: You can't win 'em all, I suppose.
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerwin2: I thought my Water and Psychic deck had all the answers...
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerwin3: But I guess some things are best left...unexplained.
tc.league.platinum.game7.pregame1: I don't know if you're popular at school...
tc.league.platinum.game7.pregame2: But you've been making quite a name for yourself 'round here.
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen1: So you won the last League, huh?
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen2: Good thing I play hockey. Why?
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen3: Cause soon I'll be skating to a victory...
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerloss1: What a game! I'm the Wayne Gretzky of Pokémon!
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerloss2: And I'm humble, too, eh? Ha-ha.
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerwin3: Good luck in the finals, eh? I'm pulling for you.
tc.league.platinum.game8.pregame1: Are you prepared to throw down?
tc.league.platinum.game8.pregame2: I'm ready to drop the gloves anytime!
tc.league.platinum.game9.loadscreen2: My deck will light you up like the Fourth of July!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerloss2: but that was an incredibly awesome win! Yeeeeeah!!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerloss3: OK. Deep breath. Calming down now. Let's play again!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerwin2: I knew you were good, but not THAT good!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerwin3: Great game! You've come a long way, {0}.
tc.league.platinum.game9.pregame1: I asked Juji to tell me some of your tricks...
tc.league.platinum.game9.pregame3: What kind of friend is that?
tc.matchmaking.menu.error.body: Uh-oh, {0} can't play right now. Try again later.
tc.matchmaking.menu.ready.body: You are about to face {0}! Prepare yourself.
tc.matchmaking.menu.start.body: {0} is ready. Prepare to do battle!
tc.popup.firstunlock.body: You have defeated your first opponent in the Trainer Challenge! The first time you defeat each opponent, your deck will update by adding more exciting and powerful cards while removing weaker cards. After 11 victories, your deck will be fully unlocked!
tc.popup.losetwogames.body: In the Trainer Challenge, you can switch out your deck between games. When your opponent has many Pokémon of a type your deck is weak to, it is very difficult to win. You may want to try using a different deck for the next game.
tc.title: Trainer Challenge
tc.tooltip.leaguelocked: Earn the {0} trophy to unlock this League!
tc.tooltip.opponentlocked: Defeat all the previous Trainers in this League to unlock this battle!
tcmain.newspanel.title: News
tcmain.speechbubble1.text: Hello! Welcome to our game store!
tcmain.title: Trainer Challenge

tournament.active.leaving.title: Leaving Tournament

tournament.complete.title: Tournament Completed
tournament.complete.tournament.title: Tournament

tournament.dialog.entryfailed.body: You do not meet all of the entry requirements for this tournament.
tournament.feature.down: Tournaments are unavailable right now. We apologize for the inconvenience.
tournament.join.error.deckinvalid: You are unable to join this tournament because your deck is invalid. Please select a different deck to play with and join the tournament again.
tournament.join.error.down.message: You are unable to join this tournament because it is closed.
tournament.join.error.feeincorrect: You are unable to join this tournament because the tournament entry fee is invalid.
tournament.join.error.feeinsufficient: Server error. Your entry fee could not be collected. Please try again later.
tournament.join.error.inanothertournamen: You are unable to join this tournament because you are already in another tournament. You must leave that tournament in order to join this one.
tournament.join.error.invalidtournamenti: You are unable to join this tournament because it has an invalid tournament ID. Please join a different tournament.
tournament.join.error.noavatarset: Please make sure your avatar is set correctly.
tournament.join.error.novaliddecks.messa: You have no decks that are legal for this format. Go to the Deck Manager and create one to play in this tournament.
tournament.join.error.novaliddecks.title: No Valid Decks
tournament.join.error.walletfailed: Tournament entry could not be completed. Please try again later.
tournament.join.failed.title: Tournament Join Failed
tournament.joinattempt.leaving.body: Are you sure you want to leave this tournament queue?
tournament.joinattempt.leaving.title: Leaving Tournament Queue
Your {0} balance is too low to join this tournament.
tournament.joinfailed.insufficientkeys.b: You have an insufficient number of Tickets to join this tournament. Select Get Tickets to go to the Shop and get more!

versusscreen.newuserexperience.guestlogi: If you create a Pokémon Trainer Club account, you will be able to collect cards, build decks, and compete against other Trainers!
You're playing as a guest. Create an account to access the full game.
versusscreen.nodecksfound.body.label: Go to Deck Manager to make a new deck.
versusscreen.nodecksfound.header.label: You don't have any decks of this format.
versusscreen.noseasonrewards.label: Check back later for new Versus Rewards!
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body1.lab: Each Versus Ladder lasts 3 weeks and provides opportunities to earn cool rewards like Trainer Tokens, booster packs, and Pokémon-EX. Versus Rewards are unlocked with Versus Points, which you earn by winning matches.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body2.lab: Versus Points are awarded each time you win a match in Versus Mode. Each victory is worth 10 points, plus 5 bonus points if your opponent had Advantage. You do not gain or lose Versus Points for losing a match. Versus Points reset to 0 at the start of each new Versus Ladder. The total number of Versus Points you’ve earned and the time remaining in the current Versus Ladder can be found to the right of the Play button.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body3.lab: The number below each reward indicates the total number of Versus Points needed to unlock it. Versus Rewards are automatically added to your Collection once unlocked. Don’t take too long earning your rewards, though, because Versus Rewards rotate every 3 weeks. Each reward can only be earned once per Versus Ladder. All Versus Rewards items are not tradable.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body4.lab: If you’re interested in seeing how you stack up against other players from around the world on the Versus Ladder, please visit Pokemon.com/leaderboards. Standings can be viewed for total Versus Points or for each play format.
